name: hex-flex
description: A simple web tool for viewing the contents and memory map of Intel HEX data files.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --format=esm --platform=browser --external:react --external:react-dom/* --external:@google/genai && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp metadata.json dist/metadata.json && cp index.css dist/index.css
